column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function of product 2D renderings as a suitable candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies. Your explanation of how it could operate and why kanban is not the best fit is well thought out. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job in addressing the proposed business function and providing specific details. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good attempt, but the explanation of why kanban is a poor fit could be more specific and clear.

10 pts - You have clearly identified the Production function as one that could benefit from implementing kanban methodologies. Great job in explaining the key aspects of kanban and how it could add value to this business function.
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate for the proposed business function. Great job!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit. 

Your response provided some insight into why scrum/sprint may not be the best fit for certain functions, but it could have been more specific and clear in discussing the poor fit.

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying a relevant cognitive bias and explaining its potential impact on Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

10 pts for Complete and correct definition

Great job defining the cognitive bias and providing a clear explanation. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in providing a detailed explanation of the potential issues and steps to address them. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Complete and clear description of possible step or action. Great job on providing a detailed and well-organized solution! Keep up the good work.
